snippet.title: Kung Fury: Street Rage Ultimate Edition - Physical Preorder Trailer - The MIX Showcase March 2023
snippet.description:
Kung Fury: Street Rage Ultimate Edition is a side-scrolling beat ‘em-up game played from a 2D perspective for consoles and PC. David Hasselhoff himself is not only playable in Kung Fury: Street Rage Ultimate Edition, but he introduces that preorders for physical editions of the game through Limited Run Games are available now for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and Nintendo Switch.

#KungFuryStreetRage #TheMIXShowcase
